location.address: 高新区唐延路旺座国际E座1010-7号

comments.author: Laurence Macguire
comments.content: The owner is very nice, I love the Chinese song there. And a tower of Carlsberg is 115.

location.address: 雁塔区 吉祥路21号吉祥小学2楼

comments.author: Laurence Macguire
comments.content: Feel like a foreign college bar. Beer is cheap. And lots of foreigners here.

location.address: 碑林区 南门外长安国际国贸春天广场2楼

comments.author: Laurence Macguire
comments.content: The coffee and beer there is nice. And it's convenient to go there.

location.address: 高新区 高新四路15号

comments.author: Jonathon Padfield
comments.content: It does a mixture of skewered BBQ meats and traditional Chinese dishes. Expect a 15-20 minute wait during popular times, but you can enterain yourself playing games, using the free internet and drinking the tea. The locals here are particuarly friendly, and may invite you to play dice and drinking games.

location.address: 高新区 高新四路光和路十字西南角

comments.author: Jonathon Padfield
comments.content: A fruit juice cafe. Milkshakes, smoothies, fruit juice, lots of different flavours. Incredibly 'cute' decor, and a second floor that feels far like a workplace accident waiting to happen.

location.address: 高新区 高新四路甲8号嘉龙大厦1楼

comments.author: Jonathon Padfield
comments.content: Very friendly proprietor, who will show you how to mix your noodles, and hold your chopsticks for you. The dumplings in soup are a speciality. The food's generally very good, and the waitresses very friendly, even when you don't speak Chinese.

location.address: 高新区 高新四路甲字8号1楼

comments.author: Jonathon Padfield
comments.content: Very local restaurant, simple benches to seat lots of people. The food is Pào mó (bread and lamb soup), with chilli and garlic provided to spice the meal up to your preference.

location.address: 高新区 高新四路8号新西蓝二期

comments.author: Jonathon Padfield
comments.content: The default KTV if your team decides to pick one close to your hotel. There's a large drinks and snacks supermarket which you can order beers, spirits and food for your team. 'Hey Jude' may be compulsary.

location.address: 高新区 高新四路8号新西蓝二期

comments.author: Jonathon Padfield
comments.content: Continuing west of the Citadines, just to the right of Funny Time KTV. Various dishes acoompanied by thin pancakes, which you wrap the food up in, and eat. Delicious.

location.address: 高新区 高新四路8号新西蓝二期

comments.author: Jonathon Padfield
comments.content: Simple meals, like noodles in soup and ro jia mo dominate the menu.

location.address: 雁塔区 科技路55号金桥国际B-C座2楼

comments.author: Jonathon Padfield
comments.content: 2nd Floor, behind the bookshop. Free wifi, really nice atmosphere. The food is overpriced.
